comments:
Using I20070607-0010, I got this warning in the .log file.

Ideally, we should avoid obtaining the lock in the UI thread. Practically, I don;t know if this will be acheivable. Another solution would be to issue the viewer update using an asyncExec. To do so, we will probably need to add some checks to the update code to handle the fact that things may have changed slightly since the update came through.
*** Bug 196049 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
